about_the_game:
Sweet Town is a "roguelike top-down shooter" video game where each game features a completely random new scenario, and both NPCs and enemies are also generated randomly, making the game challenging every time.

The player takes on the role of a child who must save their town from the influence of an Evil Spirit that has taken control of many people on Halloween night.

The enemies manipulated by this spirit are children who try to attack the character to get their candies. However, the most dangerous enemies are the adults who are influenced by this Evil Spirit.



In each game, the objective is to defeat one of these adults to obtain a rune that allows us to summon the Evil Spirit and thus defeat it once and for all. To do this, the player will have to confront the bewitched adult inside the Town Hall property, but the entrance is only possible with a special invitation that the player must obtain during the game.



Combat each enemy using the collected candies, explore the surroundings of the village searching for treasures, and complete tasks for the townsfolk.

Have fun on Halloween while saving the day from the evil spirits that roam the territory.
